text: and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormality of the heme biosynthetic pathway 90% Anemia 90% Congestive heart failure 90% Hydrops fetalis 90% Pallor 90% Hepatomegaly 50% Hydrocephalus 50% Oligohydramnios 50% Polyhydramnios 50% Splenomegaly 50% Toxemia of pregnancy 50% Abnormality of the pericardium 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
